name: githyanki-knight-xmm
prompt: heroic tabletop fantasy (D&D 5e adjacent), grounded medieval-fantasy materials, culturally coherent gear, no modern tech or signage, consistent painterly collection style, Illustration of githyanki-knight-xmm, highlight musculature and unique limbs, include human silhouette, three-color palette, underwater/sky/merged zone, depict motion, detailed concept art, cosmic surrealism, impossible geometries, starfield grain, indigo glows, palette: indigos, violets, black, cold silver, Use specified aspect/resolution; avoid artifacts., Avoid embedded text or words unless specified; never render gibberish strings., Avoid garbled or random letter strings; keep any symbols meaningful or use numbered pins., Avoid sci-fi UIs, modern signage, photoreal CGI, anime style, bloom glare.
alt_text: Concept art of githyanki-knight-xmm with anatomy, scale, and environment.
revised_prompt: Create an illustration in a consistent painterly style, influenced by heroic tabletop fantasy themes. The subject should be similar to a Githyanki knight but not identical. The figure should exhibit unique limbs and distinct musculature, and their gear should be made from materials common to a medieval fantasy setting - all culturally coherent with the knight's design. The image should contrast a silhouette of a human figure. The scenario should blur the line between an underwater and sky environment while maintaining a sense of motion. The style should infuse elements of cosmic surrealism, depicting impossible geometries and a grainy starfield. The lighting should have indigo glows against a three-color palette of indigos, violets, black, and cold silver. The image will be a detailed concept art with no modern signage, sci-fi UIs, photoreal CGI, anime style, or bloom glare. No embedded text or words and no garbled or random letter strings.
